enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: Delegates met informally and in a contact group in the morning to consider draft SBI conclusions and a decision.
The discussions included whether the conclusions should focus on immunities only, or both privileges and immunities.
Agreement was reached on draft conclusions and the contact group concluded its work.
Delegates also agreed that the draft decision text will remain as a non-paper to inform further discussions at SB 25.
